files.purpose: Lead_Followup_Draft_V2.gs version# 09/23-05:05PM EST by Chatgpt5 PURPOSE

functions.name: gl_processAddLeadEmails
functions.description: Main function to process emails labeled "Add lead" Called every 15 minutes by time-based trigger

functions.description: Process a single thread

functions.name: gl_extractEmailContent_
functions.description: Extract content from email message Handles both plain text and HTML emails

functions.name: gl_processWithGemini_
functions.description: Process email content with Gemini API Returns CSV string with 21 comma-separated values

functions.name: gl_callGeminiAPI_
functions.description: Make actual API call to Gemini

functions.name: gl_writeToSheet_
functions.description: Write CSV string to column A of Leads sheet Stage Automation will auto-split it across columns

functions.name: gl_getOrCreateLabel_
functions.description: Get existing label or create it if it doesn't exist

functions.name: gl_log_
functions.description: Log operation with timestamp

functions.name: gl_installTrigger
functions.description: Install time-based trigger to check for "Add lead" emails every 15 minutes

functions.name: gl_removeTrigger
functions.description: Remove existing trigger

functions.name: gl_diagnosticCheck
functions.description: Run diagnostics to check setup

functions.name: gl_testProcessOneEmail
functions.description: Process one email immediately for testing

functions.name: gl_showConfiguration
functions.description: Show configuration info

files.purpose: LEAN-TO & A-FRAME RUBY (Exact) — Drive File Export Version# [INTEGRATED] by Gino + ChatGPT Triggers on edits to Leads!T:AD (cols 20–30) when AA contains:

functions.name: r_buildRubyFromLeanToTemplate_
functions.description: Replace ONLY the parameter literals in the Lean-to Ruby template. Every other character (including spacing and comments) is preserved verbatim.

functions.name: r_buildRubyFromAFrameTemplate_
functions.description: Replace ONLY the parameter literals in the A-Frame Ruby template. Every other character (including spacing and comments) is preserved verbatim.

functions.name: r_getLeanToRubyTemplate_
functions.description: LEAN-TO RUBY TEMPLATE — DO NOT CHANGE ANYTHING HERE. We substitute only the parameter values via r_buildRubyFromLeanToTemplate_().

functions.name: r_getAFrameRubyTemplate_
functions.description: A-FRAME RUBY TEMPLATE — DO NOT CHANGE ANYTHING HERE. We substitute only the parameter values via r_buildRubyFromAFrameTemplate_().

functions.name: handleEditLeanToRuby_
functions.description: Backward compatibility wrappers for old function names

files.version: [01/06-10:30AM EST] - Complete estimate and invoice management

functions.name: convertEstimateToInvoice
functions.description: Convert estimate to invoice for awarded jobs Run this from Awarded sheet with active cell on the row to convert

functions.description: Process all rows in Awarded sheet that have estimates but no invoices

functions.description: Send estimate for current row in Leads sheet to QuickBooks

functions.description: Helper: Find existing customer or create new one in QuickBooks

functions.name: parseAddress_
functions.description: Helper: Parse address string into QuickBooks address object

functions.name: configureEnvironment
functions.description: Configure QuickBooks environment (production vs sandbox)

functions.name: listQuickBooksItems
functions.description: Debug: List all QuickBooks items (for line item configuration)

functions.description: Web app entry point - MUST be deployed as web app

functions.description: Test QuickBooks connection

functions.name: showRedirectUri_
functions.description: Helper function to show current redirect URI and setup instructions
